title: How can I get a champion removed from my "Owned Champions"?
body:
The TL;DR is the title.  Here's some details!

I got an "Honor Capsule" from playing a bunch with some cool people. Yay!
It contained:

* 2 key fragments
* 1 champion that I am lousy with
* 1 skin for that champion


Now this may sound great, but not so much to me.  I only play LoL with my friends, and I am really not very good with all the champions.  This wouldn't be a problem except that my friends love ARAM, and we play it more than anything else.

So now, I have a champion I specifically am lousy with mixed in with the champions I was pretty careful about buying (so that I only owned champions I was halfway good at using).  

If I had known that I would simply permanently unlock a champion (rather than having to go through the crafting system, which all items up til now made me do), I would simply never opened it, ever. 

In the Account settings, it says that the champion is "Not Refundable."  That's fine, but I would like him to simply be deleted.

How do I make that happen?

replies.body:
I definitely get where you are coming from.  Sometimes you just wanna to shun certain champions.

We should be able to help out with that though!  I found the champion in question, and I've gone ahead and deleted it from your account (along with the skin).  This is a one-time kinda deal, so you won't be able to request it again.

Hopefully this keeps the fun you have in ARAM's going!  Let me know if you have any other questions!

I wish I could delete Urgot from my account too. I made a grave mistake when i decided to re-roll champ shards and got him. never re-rolling again, EVER. I got the ONE EFFING CHAMP i never wanted to get, and now cant get rid of him T_T {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
What was the champion and skin? For science of course...
Wait so... does he get a refund? LUL

No. I've been on boards for awhile. I remember there used to be a guy who made an oath  to never buy Teemo. He ended up making a post and ticket about how he got it from a mystery gift from a friend or loot... he eventually got it removed thanks to a Rioter. 

I wouldn't say it'say it's refund because it was a gift from riot for honor.And it's a simple request that he doesn't want it. Same thing for the Teemo guy I believe.
